mapper.insert: insert into admin (admin_code, password, password_salt, admin_name, weixin, status, login_times, update_time) values (#{adminCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passwordSalt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weixin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update admin set admin_code = #{adminCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password_salt = #{passwordSalt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admin_name = #{adminName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, weixin = #{weixin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_times = #{loginTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select admin_id, admin_code, password, password_salt, admin_name, weixin, status, login_times, update_time from admin where admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select admin_id, admin_code, password, password_salt, admin_name, weixin, status, login_times, update_time from admin
